answers.answer: "Will i get Type 2 diabetes in the future???"That really depends on your lifestyle and whether there is family history. Just Google "How to avoid diabetes" for some simple steps to follow.

question: I have been diagonised with PCOS and my doctor prescribed Metformin twice a day. I dont have type 2 diabetes now. Will i get Type 2 diabetes in the future???
title: PCOS & Type 2 diabetes
